short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stream your favorite TV m3u-playlist seamlessly with our feature-rich M3U IPTV app. It is completely free and easy to use!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Test your M3U playlist-URL with the M3U IPTV player.

The player supports M3U playlists in HLS or DASH.

More information: https://m3u-ip.tv/
